original_title: hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade Day 1
overview: Our Bright Parade is hololive's musical concert portion of the SUPER EXPO 2023.  As with the previous fes concert, this will be fully 3D Augmented Reality, with talent moving around the stage and accompanied by a live band. This year has been described as "a nonstop shiny stage where anyone can join the parade anytime, regardless of generation and boundary".
title: hololive 4th fes. Our Bright Parade Day 1
